name: Kaaarot
description:
Eat the Kaaarot then eat them !

Controls :

  • Move: arrows keys or WASD 
  • Use items / Taunt / Dash :  space key
  • Gamepad enable

-------------------------

Fight to get the Kaaarot or cooperate to avoid being eaten!

Catching the Kaaarot ( that is a carrot :) ) turns you into a monster for 15 seconds. You can then eat the other players, and that's the only way to win points!

Take advantage or defend yourself with the items the characters bring into crates !

The rabbit: the baseball bat to stun

The dog: the cursed hat,  a trap to reverse directions


The cat: the smoke bomb


The penguin: the teleporter

  • 2 to 4 player
  • ranked or party game of 2 minutes
  • 4 characters who bring their own items to the game
  • Seasonal content
  • Seasonal content
  • taunt and skins
  • unlockable aesthetic content
  • map selection
  • community system with public or private chat

Feel free to join our Discord to tell us about your feedback: https://discord.gg/a58db5MmKs

Kaaarot.com is developed by Florian & Alexandre (Lambda Humans Studios).
